title: Curse Cultivation
alternative_title: Curse Cultivation ; Kao Zuzhou Xiuxian De Wo Youdian Buduijin  ;  Cultivating Immortality Through Curses  ;  Kào Zǔzhòu Xiūxiān De Wǒ Yǒudiǎn Bùduìjìn  ;  There's Something Wrong With Me Who Relies on Curses to Cultivate Immortality  ;  靠诅咒修仙的我有点不对劲
status: Curse Cultivation ; Kao Zuzhou Xiuxian De Wo Youdian Buduijin  ;  Cultivating Immortality Through Curses  ;  Kào Zǔzhòu Xiūxiān De Wǒ Yǒudiǎn Bùduìjìn  ;  There's Something Wrong With Me Who Relies on Curses to Cultivate Immortality  ;  靠诅咒修仙的我有点不对劲
description:
Description :
        You don’t belong to this world, and yet you wish to step onto the path of cultivation. Targeted by the Heavens, they cast a curse on you, one unbreakable even by immortals. All changes in your body will be reversed, and you will no longer be able to cultivate again.
Jiang Chen tries to cultivate, but realises that his spiritual energy flows backwards, and scatters in all directions.
When he was in despair, he was struck by lightning.
Jiang Chen fell into silence, “???”
I have to cultivate like this?
